classification.Species: N.Â palmataShen, 1948, originally described as Caridina palmata [2]

text.__SUMMARY__: Neocaridina palmata is a freshwater shrimp found in China and Vietnam. It is found in rivers, streams and ponds. Their preferred habitat is heavily planted, slow flowing water.
text.Subspecies:
There are 4 subspecies:
Neocaridina palmata bosensis (Cai, 1996)
Neocaridina palmata luodianica (Liang, 2004)
Neocaridina palmata meridionalis (Liang, 2004)
Neocaridina palmata palmata (Shen, 1948)
